sn9.5:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anando kosalesu viharati annatarasmim vanasande.
sn9.5:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma anando ativelam gihisannattibahulo viharati.
sn9.5:1.3: Atha kho ya tasmim vanasande adhivattha devata ayasmato anandassa anukampika atthakama ayasmantam anandam samvejetukama yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn9.5:3.1: Atha kho ayasma anando taya devataya samvejito samvegamapaditi.
